title: Lollie
description: Welcome to the Candy shopWhere poison never tasted so sweet...By day, Lollie Evans is the star of the adult film industryBy night, she’s a member of the Candy shop.Utilizing the gifts god gave her and the money she used to enhance them,Lollie’s role is to entice and distract.But seeing her friends fall like dominos makes Lollie realize there is more to life than work.And after a decade of doing movies, it’s time to settle down and find something more serious.Of course, her serious intentions turn into the punchline of a joke when a biker, a cowboy, and a porn star walk into the room and flip her world upside down.With one last movie to film, Lollie intends to go out with a bang—literally.But behind the scenes, something dark and sinister is happeningAnd not everyone is happy for Lollie to retire.After all, stars were born to shine, not fade away.They’ll do anything it takes to keep the cameras rollingEven if that means watching Lollie crash and burn.Authors note : Lollie is the peen queen meaning the lucky lady ends up living the dream with a peen for every occasion. If that's not your jam and you are looking for a straight-up M/F romance, you should check out one of my other books. However, if you're a connoisseur of peen, then please follow me down the rabbit hole.Triggers : This book contains some dark themes, so please proceed with caution. Due to its content, this book is only suitable for people over the age of eighteen.
author: Candice M.  Wright
